Sentencas: The objective of this paper is to analyze the dynamics of distribution systems that contain fuel cells and to enhance the stability of these systems by controlling the fuel cells.
Titulo: Dynamic and transient analysis of power distribution systems with fuel cells - Part II: Control and stability enhancement

Sentencas: The models used in this second part of the two-part paper are the solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC) models developed in part one.
Titulo: Dynamic and transient analysis of power distribution systems with fuel cells - Part II: Control and stability enhancement

Sentencas: The fuel-cell control loops through the power conditioning units are first explained using a one-machine infinite bus system.
Titulo: Dynamic and transient analysis of power distribution systems with fuel cells - Part II: Control and stability enhancement

Sentencas: Then, fuel cells are integrated into a power distribution test system, which initially contains gas turbines only.
Titulo: Dynamic and transient analysis of power distribution systems with fuel cells - Part II: Control and stability enhancement

Sentencas: Simulation results show how a combination of fuel cells and gas turbines can help control frequency fluctuations, and supply power after islanding of the distribution system.
Titulo: Dynamic and transient analysis of power distribution systems with fuel cells - Part II: Control and stability enhancement
